<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:summary-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw-005-anobel.com -->
<a id="overview"></a>

## 2. OVERVIEW

Fixed two issues in generate-context.js: (1) API naming mismatch where retry-manager.js called snake_case methods (get_db, initialize_db) but vector-index.js exported camelCase names - resolved by adding snake_case aliases to exports; (2) Template warnings for 17 V2.2 spec'd-but-unimplemented placeholders - resolved by adding OPTIONAL_PLACEHOLDERS suppression set to template-renderer.js. Also captured a learning about changelog symlink conventions (changelogs written in Public repo, symlinked to anobel.com). Changes synced to both anobel.com and Public repos, changelog updated to v1.2.3.2, committed and pushed.

**Key Outcomes**:
- Fixed two issues in generate-context.js: (1) API naming mismatch where retry-manager.js called...
- Decision: Add snake_case aliases to vector-index.
- Decision: Suppress V2.
- Decision: Keep anobel.
- Technical Implementation Details

**Key Files:**

| **File** | **Description** |
|:---------|:----------------|
| `.opencode/.../search/vector-index.js` | Updated vector index |
| `.opencode/.../renderers/template-renderer.js` | Placeholders - resolved by adding OPTIONAL_PLACEHOLDERS s... |
| `.opencode/skill/system-spec-kit/CHANGELOG.md` | File modified (description pending) |
| `specs/.../084-generate-context-template-warnings/spec.md` | File modified (description pending) |
| `specs/.../084-generate-context-template-warnings/plan.md` | File modified (description pending) |
| `specs/.../084-generate-context-template-warnings/tasks.md` | File modified (description pending) |
| `specs/.../084-generate-context-template-warnings/implementation-summary.md` | File modified (description pending) |

<a id="detailed-changes"></a>

## 3. DETAILED CHANGES

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-two-issues-generatecontextjs-api-0370f324-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw -->
### FEATURE: Fixed two issues in generate-context.js: (1) API naming mismatch where retry-manager.js called...

Fixed two issues in generate-context.js: (1) API naming mismatch where retry-manager.js called snake_case methods (get_db, initialize_db) but vector-index.js exported camelCase names - resolved by adding snake_case aliases to exports; (2) Template warnings for 17 V2.2 spec'd-but-unimplemented placeholders - resolved by adding OPTIONAL_PLACEHOLDERS suppression set to template-renderer.js. Also captured a learning about changelog symlink conventions (changelogs written in Public repo, symlinked to anobel.com). Changes synced to both anobel.com and Public repos, changelog updated to v1.2.3.2, committed and pushed.

**Details:** generate-context.js | get_db is not a function | template warnings | OPTIONAL_PLACEHOLDERS | snake_case aliases | vector-index.js | retry-manager.js | API mismatch | V2.2 placeholders | template-renderer.js
<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-two-issues-generatecontextjs-api-0370f324-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw -->

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-technical-implementation-details-67947fa8-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw -->
### IMPLEMENTATION: Technical Implementation Details

rootCause: retry-manager.js used snake_case method names (get_db, initialize_db, get_memory) but vector-index.js only exported camelCase versions (getDb, initializeDb, getMemory); solution: Added snake_case export aliases to vector-index.js module.exports block, and added OPTIONAL_PLACEHOLDERS set to template-renderer.js to suppress warnings for unimplemented V2.2 features; patterns: Export aliasing for backward compatibility; warning suppression for spec'd-but-unimplemented features

<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:implementation-technical-implementation-details-67947fa8-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw -->

<!-- /ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:detailed-changes-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw-005-anobel.com -->

## 4. DECISIONS

<!-- ANCHOR_EXAMPLE:decision-snakecase-aliases-vector-eae97e32-session-1770144272463-vi6x3blhw -->
### Decision 1: Decision: Add snake_case aliases to vector

**Context**: index.js exports rather than refactoring retry-manager.js to use camelCase - maintains backward compatibility without breaking existing consumers

**Timestamp**: 2026-02-03T19:44:32Z

**Importance**: medium

#### Options Considered

1. **Chosen Approach**
   Decision: Add snake_case aliases to vector

#### Chosen Approach

**Selected**: Chosen Approach

**Rationale**: index.js exports rather than refactoring retry-manager.js to use camelCase - maintains backward compatibility without breaking existing consumers

#### Trade-offs

**Confidence**: 80%

## RECOVERY HINTS

**Diagnostic guidance for common session recovery scenarios.**

### Recovery Scenarios

| Scenario | Symptoms | Recovery Action |
|----------|----------|-----------------|
| Context Loss | Agent doesn't remember prior work | Run `/spec_kit:resume 003-memory-and-spec-kit/084-generate-context-template-warnings` |
| State Mismatch | Files don't match expected state | Verify with `git status` and `git diff` |
| Memory Not Found | Search returns no results | Check `memory_search({ specFolder: "003-memory-and-spec-kit/084-generate-context-template-warnings" })` |
| Stale Context | Information seems outdated | Check `last_accessed_epoch` vs current time |
| Incomplete Handover | Missing continuation context | Review CONTINUE SESSION section above |
| Dedup Collision | Wrong memory surfaced | Check `fingerprint_hash` for conflicts |

### Diagnostic Commands

```bash
# Check memory index health
node .opencode/skill/system-spec-kit/mcp_server/lib/storage/checkpoints.js --status

# List memories for this spec folder
memory_search({ specFolder: "003-memory-and-spec-kit/084-generate-context-template-warnings", limit: 10 })

# Verify memory file integrity
ls -la 005-anobel.com/memory/

# Check for orphaned memories
memory_search({ query: "orphaned", anchors: ["state"] })

# Force re-index of this spec folder
node .opencode/skill/system-spec-kit/scripts/memory/generate-context.js 005-anobel.com --force
```

### Recovery Priority

1. **Verify spec folder exists** - Check path is correct
2. **Load memory context** - Use memory_search to surface prior work
3. **Review last session state** - Check PROJECT STATE SNAPSHOT
4. **Validate pending tasks** - Review CONTINUE SESSION section
5. **Resume with handover prompt** - Use continuation template above
